mission.title: OUR STORY
mission.text: From inception, RJCO Howick Pty Ltd has sought to cater to a niche in the market with a focus on family owned enterprises and Small to Medium businesses. This vision remains - to supply an all-encompassing basket of services to these business people. Our client family is diversified in both business types and sizes. Whether you are running a start-up or a company that has been operating for decades, our team is here to help you make the best financial decisions.
mission.services: We offer the full range of bookkeeping; accounting; consulting and tax services: Monthly Accounting and Bookkeeping on-site and online • Payroll for any size business • Statutory returns, EMP201's; EMP501's; VAT201's • COiDA/WCA registrations and filing of Annual Return of Earnings • Tax Consulting, submission of provisional and annual tax returns for individuals and companies • Preparing of annual financial statements on an Independent Review and Compilation basis • Advisory and Consulting • Internal auditing when requested • Company and Trust registrations • Annual CIPC Company registration renewals • and more..
